text: “But Without You” is a song by Italian-Indian singer Janalynn Castelino. The song was released on 21 March 2025. == Release Background == The song was recorded and written by Castelino in English, as a follow up to her previous release "Drama". The song’s lyrics is inspired by love and longing. A teaser was released to confirm the release date and title. == Charts == Country Major position Austria 51 Lithuania 19 Latvia 21 Norway 67 == References == == Other websites == * Music video on YouTube Category:Pop songs Category:Dance-pop songs Category:2025 songs
title: But Without You
